title: Palestinian Voters Debate Staying Home for Israeli Election
description: As Israel prepares to go to the polls again, some of the voters who helped propel an Arab party into the governing coalition for the first time are worried about a lack of results.
dc:creator: Raja Abdulrahim
media:description: An Israeli Arab voting in last yearâ€™s election. A million Palestinians are eligible to vote in Israel, 17 percent of the electorate.
